item.title: Kubernetes Absolute Beginner
item.description: Kubernetes Overview Kubernetes (K8s) was initially built by Google but is now an open-source project (CNCF). Containers Overview Containers are not a new concept and they’ve been around for 10+ years. They exist in other forms like LXC (hard, low-level) but Docker has become the defacto standard due to the ease it brings at a higher level to create containers. Containers are completely isolated environments that can contain their own processes / network interfaces / mounts but share the same OS kernel.
